trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> event that occurs when a user completes a drag operation with the mouse of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The horizontal change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control, resulting from the drag operation.
The vertical change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control, resulting from the drag operation.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag operation was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*> method.
Gets whether the drag operation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*> method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a drag operation was canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the horizontal change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> after the user drags the control with the mouse.

The horizontal difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.

Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler"></xref> type.
This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler>.
Gets the vertical change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> after the user drags the control with the mouse.

The vertical difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
